Package dkeep.logic

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Map class, manages all the map related events. Includes default maps, a test map for unit testing, and auxiliary functions for a Personalized Map.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map​()
      Creates an empty Map with nothing.
      Map​(int test)
      Creates a map according to the number within test.
      Map​(int width, int height)
      Creates a Personalized map "skeleton" (only the outline with walls).

    • Method Summary

      Sets the char matrix of a Personalized map to something else.

      Associates an actual char matrix to the current Map object depending on the level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map​()
        Creates an empty Map with nothing.

      • Map

        public Map​(int test)
        Creates a map according to the number within test.
        Parameters:
        test - If it is 0, creates level1 Map, any other value will be used to create a unit testing map.

      • Map

        public Map​(int width,
           int height)
        Creates a Personalized map "skeleton" (only the outline with walls).
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the map.
        height - Height of the map.

    • Method Detail

      • setMap

        public void setMap​(int current)
        Associates an actual char matrix to the current Map object depending on the level.
        Parameters:
        current - The level.

      • getMatrix

        public char[][] getMatrix​()
        Returns:
        The char matrix associated with this map.

      • getCurrentMap

        public int getCurrentMap​()
        Returns:
        The current level.

      • setCustomMapTo

        public void setCustomMapTo​(char[][] newMap)
        Sets the char matrix of a Personalized map to something else.
        Parameters:
        newMap - The char matrix.

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap​(int y,
                      int x,
                      char change)
        Changes the cell inside the char matrix of the Map object.
        Parameters:
        y - Y coordinate of that cell in the matrix.
        x - X coordinate.
        change - What you want to change it to.
